testcase.name: Create object scenarios - Attepmt to create a object with unsupported media

The 415 status code indicates that the origin server is refusing to service the request because the payload is in a format not supported by this method on the target resource. One of the examples of getting 415 would be sending a request with a Content-Type header which is not equal to application/json |
